298567.軍司令部に到着した <pc>たちは\nエテーネ王国の 慰霊碑を訪れた。すると\n:
Arriving at the Royal Army Headquarters, and the others visited the Cenotaph of Ethene Kingdom. Then Mereade also
came to the cenotaph.

298568.「<kyodai>……。\n 弟のために わざわざ ありがとう。:
<kyodai>... thanks for going out of your
way to help my brother.

298569.「ううん。おいらこそ もっと早く\n ここに来られたら よかったんだけど。: No. I wish I could have come here earlier.

298570.「……あれからね。\n おいらも 色々あったんだよ クオード。: ...Since then. I've been through a lot, Quard.

298571.「何千年も 時渡りを くり返しながら\n 心のどこかで 思ってたんだ。:
I've been thinking about it in the back of my
mind for thousands of years while time
traveling.

298572.「おいらさえ あきらめなければ……\n 君が あやまちを起こさない未来に\n た:
If only I hadn't given up... we could have
reached a future where you didn't make the
same mistakes.

298573.「でも そんなの 思い上がりでさ。\n エテーネの村の悲劇を 止められないのと同:
But that's hubris. Just as nothing could stop
the tragedy in Ethene Village, the reality
is...it was very cruel.

298574.「……今でも 悔やんでる。\n もっと 他の方法が あったんじゃないか。\n 君:
I still regret it. I thought there was a
better way. I could have done something for
you.

298575.「私も……。私も あなたと同じです。\n あやまちを犯した人を 救えずに\n ず:
I'm... I'm the same as you. I've been feeling
sorry for myself for not being able to save
someone who made a mistake.

298576.「私のお姉様は 取り返しのつかない 罪を犯し\n 最後は 贖罪のように 散ってい:
My sister committed an irrevocable sin, and in
the end, she was scattered as if in atonement.

298577.「それでも お姉様が 世界を守るために戦った\n 強くて 優しい人だったことは:
Even so, it doesn't change the fact that your sister was a strong and gentle person who fought to protect the world. I want to carry
on her memory.

298578.「あなたも どうか 失った人の思いを\n 大切にしてあげてくださいね……。:
And you, please, cherish the thoughts of those
you have lost...

298579.「うん……おいらも忘れない。\n クオードが 大切にしていたものを。:
Yeah...I won't forget it either. I'll never
forget what Quard meant to me.

298580.「我らは ここに誓う。\n 自らのチカラで 時を生き\n よりよき未来へ 向かわ:
We hereby pledge. We hereby pledge that we
will use our own strength to live through time
and face a better future...

298581.「クオードも そう 望んでいたと思う。: I'm sure Quard would have wanted that.

298582.「あなたが遺した 思いと未来……\n 私が 継いでいくわ クオード。:
I will carry on your legacy of thought and
future, Quard.

298584.<pc>たちは それぞれに\n命を落とした者たちを 思い浮かべながら\n静かに:
<pc> prayed silently, remembering
those who lost their lives...

298585.メレアーデは 涙をぬぐって 去っていった。\nクオードを悼むことができた <ky:
Mereade wiped away her tears and left.
<kyodai>, who was able to mourn Quard,
once again promised to help.

298586.現・自由人の集落にいる ワグミカを訪ね\n時渡りと錬金術の 専門家として\n<k:
I will visit Wagmika's house in the present Freedom Village and introduce him to as an expert in time travel and
alchemy.
